member.name: DWRITE_FACTORY_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of DirectWrite factory object.

member.name: DWRITE_FACTORY_TYPE.DWRITE_FACTORY_TYPE_SHARED
member.summary: Indicates that the DirectWrite factory is a shared factory and that it allows for the reuse of cached font data across multiple in-process components. Such factories also take advantage of cross process font caching components for better performance.

member.name: DWRITE_FACTORY_TYPE.DWRITE_FACTORY_TYPE_ISOLATED
member.summary: Indicates that the DirectWrite factory object is isolated. Objects created from the isolated factory do not interact with internal DirectWrite state from other components.
